description: Number of switching networks (see Harrison reference for precise definition).
comments: The next term a(8) is too large to be displayed here.
references: M. A. Harrison, On the number of classes of switching networks, J. Franklin Instit., 276 (1963), 313-327.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..12
